document_data.mainbody:
Katelyn Lerskin was a Gur monster hunter from a tribe led by Ulma that traveled along the Sword Coast and Western Heartlands during the late 15 century DR.
Katelyn was a tan-skinned Gur with short reddish brown hair and a facial tattoo. She wore a set of leathers and was armed with a war hammer.
In the , Katelyn Lerskins monster hunter tribe found itself targeted by the vampires of Baldurs Gate during the Absolute crisis when the Gurs camped in the Rivington district of the city, along with a small army of refugees displaced by the conflict. To the Gurs horror, the tribes children were abducted by the vampires under orders from Cazador Szarr. Katelyn could be found near Ulma as she attended the tribes funeral bonfire.
